Reviews.Title: “Very nice place”
Reviews.Author: gregz69
Reviews.Content: stayed seven nights august decor lobby bedrooms quite plain clean fresh looking lifts excellent never waited couple seconds lift rooms big two one bathroom one bedroom useful bed wonderfully comfortable pool top floor nice well lit would nice location excellant shops restaurants sightseeing within walking distance buses stop around corner trips even airport housekeeping wasnt reliable room never cleaned late afternoon often didnt replace tea sugar one day bed towels made one person instead two left hallway days even left several hours hallway one morning went breakfast told buffet breakfast finished said thought available 1000 said yes could buffet someone brought fruit juice one came wanted tea coffee one plates find someone pay bill following morning went breakfast 30 minutes earlier even wait table tables made lunch welcoming restaurant serves bar meals happy hour paid good value good hotel needs pay little bit attention detail

Reviews.Title: “Nice”
Reviews.Author: ChrisP78
Reviews.Content: came town see home stadium decided spend night instead driving home late booked hotwire got great rate hotel arrived desk clerks cordial friendly arrived around 1pm even ask rooms ready put us king room room nice clean comfortable bed large bathroom bad thing corner room without window outside think could asked different room decided would ok location really nice right monument circle close everything downtown new stadium thing hotel roughly blocks book hotel great stay

Reviews.Title: “Good Timing”
Reviews.Author: Acts412
Reviews.Content: booked hotel room hotwire saved 40 vs hotel site hotel heart downtown means pay 18 parking shopping within walking distance really nice room really large believe room didnt free wireless internet breakfast thought could included pool area wasnt greatest 19 floor hotel pool pretty small hot tub really small 6 person large hotel crazy exercise room located one floor pool area provided current equipment assortment tvs hotel wasnt bad price would stay somewhere else next time since pool area wasnt great

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Stay”
Reviews.Author: FreeSandySprings
Reviews.Content: stay indianapolis booked rate got call deluxe 2 queen room really small suite staff polite buffet breakfast good bad price adjoining seafood restaurant good food slow bit pricey 19

Reviews.Title: “Nice, but not as close to convention center as other hotels”
Reviews.Author: janestclaire95
Reviews.Content: travel frequently business stayed hotel issues stay feb 08 issues experienced 1 room vacuumed stay 4 nights 2 towels bathroom bath call housekeeping housekeeping also removed robe room actually something enjoyed 3 1 trash room small coffee maker either call tea bags usually room 4 room service quick food pretty bad menu upgraded joke meant price hardly choices 5 requested menu brought room new prices received menu new one stained across phone guest services brought yet another menu room asked person new menu look one delivered looked though someone pulled trash free meal something 6 couple occasions given new toiletries fortunately still use besides tired calling services disappointed hotel staff usually courteous breakfast buffet usually good cleanliness important also gold hilton member free breakfast pay 4 eggs etc also stay suites different cities little basket arrive 2 bottles water get nothing hilton checking places stay lot choices indianapolis

Reviews.Title: “It was great!”
Reviews.Author: Jakey450
Reviews.Content: family stayed one night went game great property staff polite friendly rooms large clean updated great indoor pool fitness center new equipment breakfast buffet wide selection good food holiday weekend great location things downtown area

Reviews.Title: “Great experience”
Reviews.Author: SCSarah
Reviews.Content: indianapolis hilton fairly modern hotel great location right street indianapolis largest mall lots good eating options upon checking upgraded suite room spacious bed comfortable showers water fine ordered dessert room service couple times good came quickly checked found note room house felt brought attention front desk moved wasnt big deal returned dinner evening voice room phone asked call discuss found hand written note door offering free breakfast felt truly cared comfort stay thing giving property five stars staff exception manager mentioned everyone else rather towards first pulled valet busy someone inside took several minutes noticed waiting also never desk needed arrange ride airport inroom guide hotel services said could arrange transportation called guest services said unable arrange transportation could call taxi surprised hilton willing make effort call car service especially room guide said overall excellent hotel would definitely stay would management spend little time training staff customer service

Reviews.Title: “GREAT!!”
Reviews.Author: vincent
Reviews.Content: wife stayed hotel amazed size rooms room enormous living dining area 2 bathrooms oversized bedroom like staying apartment believe used apartments turned hotel youre looking space hotel staff friendly place clean date furnishings overall nice hotel stay

Reviews.Title: “Great Getaway”
Reviews.Author: traveler pam
Reviews.Content: property located circle capital building approximately three block north center lobby spacious located near front entrance well hotel buffet restaurant staff excellent valet parking 22 car fast room junior suite two queens pull sofa bathroom good sized well room hall elevators lobby well maintained would highly recommend hotel reading earlier reviews believe someone pays 55 night quality property like complain cant stay red roof paid night considered fair price quality hotel
